messages

Class EditMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • messages.Message
      • messages.EditMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EditMessage
extends Message
    Version:
    1.0 This class represents the message to exchange when to verify the permissions of a specific file/folder
    Author:
    Clash of Devs
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        command - Represents the command of the message
